buyUnitsBatch(address,string[],uint256[].details: msg.sender will be used as weapons payer

params.maxWeaponsToSell: Maximum amounts of weapons to sell for each unit types
params.settlementAddress: Settlement's address army of which will receive units

createCultists(uint32).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

decreaseToxicity(address,string,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

params.settlementAddress: An address of the settlement which triggered toxicity decrease

epoch().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

getZoneTime(uint256).details: Takes into an account previous value and current cultists penalty and extrapolates to value at provided timestamp

handleCultistsDefeated(address,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

handleCultistsSummoned(address,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

increaseToxicity(address,string,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

params.settlementAddress: An address of the settlement which triggered toxicity increase

init(uint256).details: Called by factory contract which creates current instance

updateState().details: This function is called every time when production should be modified

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

cultistsSettlement.details: Immutable, initialized on the zone creation

settlementsMarket.details: Immutable, initialized on the zone creation

unitsPools.details: Immutable, initialized on the zone creation

workersPool.details: Immutable, initialized on the zone creation

zoneIndex.details: Immutable, initialized on the zone creation

buyUnitsBatch(address,string[],uint256[].notice: Buys specified units for specified amount of weapons in current zone

cultistsSummonTime().notice: Last time cultists were summoned in this zone

decreaseToxicity(address,string,uint256).notice: Decreases toxicity relative to specified resources amount

getPenaltyFromCultists().notice: Calculates penalty according to current cultists count

getZoneTime(uint256).notice: Calculates zone time with provided timestamp

increaseToxicity(address,string,uint256).notice: Increases toxicity relative to specified resources amount

settlementsMarket().notice: Mapping containing units market for provided unit type

summonCultists().notice: Summons cultists if conditions are met

toxicity().notice: Amount of toxicity in this zone

unitsPools(string).notice: Mapping containing units pool for provided unit type
